thread.title: Simon Cowell's French chateau at Judges' Houses was haunted with ghosts and mysterious opening doors - TV
thread.title_full: Simon Cowell's French chateau at Judges' Houses was haunted with ghosts and mysterious opening doors - TV News - Digital Spy

author: Rachel Babbage
title: Simon Cowell's French chateau at Judges' Houses was haunted with ghosts and mysterious opening doors - TV
text: Simon Cowell may be suffering sleepless nights over his Six Chair Challenge decisions, but maybe there is something else keeping him up.News has emerged that the Château de Moh property where he filmed his Judges' Houses segment in was haunted - and it even forced Cowell to move rooms. © HomeAway.co.ukSimon Cowell's HomeAway chateau for X Factor And it's not a case of Cowell paranoia; previous residents have reported tapping on windows and closed doors mysteriously opening at the HomeAway holiday rental home.Locals have also claimed they have seen ghosts walking around the French chateau and its grounds. © HomeAway.co.ukSimon Cowell's HomeAway chateau for X Factor Cowell was choosing his top three for the live shows with help from Louis Tomlinson.See the pair pick from the Overs category and the other judges Cheryl Fernandez-Versini, Rita Ora and Nick Grimshaw decide from theirs when The X Factor continues on ITV1 on Saturday at 8pm and Sunday at 7.30pm.
